column5: Every time I try to copy the URL link from photobucket and paste it to a topic on OFC nothing happens. Anyone know why ?
I have no idea. Mine works fine. When did it stop working?
I just tried it again. Stopped working this afternoon. still not working
I just posted a pic,no problem here.
I just tried it on another website with no problems. Not sure whats going on ?

Part of the ongoing "quote" problem of IE. You can get around it by going to the reply options and selecting HTML.. then use the [ img ] tags like old times and enter your webaddress between the tags.

Part of the ongoing "quote" problem of IE. You can get around it buy going to the reply options and selecting HTML.. then use the [ img ] tags like old times and enter your webaddress between the tags.  You misspelled and missed a space. Are you ok Wayne?
